1) EFFECT OF WORD_DURATION (# OF SAMPLES)

Figure 4:
(left) Total samples, number of correct predictions of lipreader -vs- word_duration (# of frames);
(right) percentage of correct lipreader predictions -vs- word_duration (# of frames)

 

2) EFFECT OF BILABIALS

Figure 5:
(left) Total samples, number of correct predictions of lipreader -vs- whether word is bilabial (1) or not (0);
(right) percentage of correct lipreader predictions -vs- whether word is bilabial (1) or not (0)

 

3) EFFECT OF # OF SYLLABLES

Figure 6:
(left) Total samples, number of correct predictions of lipreader -vs- # of syllables in word;
(right) percentage of correct lipreader predictions -vs- # of syllables in word
